(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)这次你跑不掉了！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)愚蠢的行为！Split要让你付出代价！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)Split还能扛很多下！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)要对付我们，你还差远了。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)等着！Split马上干掉你！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)受死吧！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)就那点儿还想吓唬Split？
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)哈？你是认真的吗？
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你别想吓到Split。
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Split对此不以为然！
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)不！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)Split表示很抱歉！不是故意射击你的。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)这台机器开始让Split生气了！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)你别想就这样打死Split！
(variant)(threat)让Split来教教你更高超的飞行动作！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)勇敢的尝试！只是不够明智！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)Split可以轻松解决！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)Split可以承受住更多攻击！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你找死么？
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)Split有一桩好生意要跟你谈。
(variant)(NPC bribe fails)噢好吧，Split已经尝试过了！
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。
该指令可能需要更长时间完成。
将新坐标分发到各僚舰上。
所有船只到达后向我报告。
报告：所有船只已到达指定位置。
(grateful)没有你我们是不可能成功的。
(during combat)保持阵型，我们需要支援，现在！
(group of small ships - winning)我们正在碾压他们！
(group of small ships - winning)我们压制住了他们！
(group of small ships - losing)我们完全处于下风。
(group of small ships - losing)我们快承受不住了。
(response to distress call - singular)坚持住，我来了！
(response to distress call - plural)我们已收到你的请求，正在前往。
请按引导停靠至指定位置。
他们已为我们划定停靠位置。
请按照信号将飞船对齐。
你的到来是我们的荣幸。
我们衷心欢迎你的到来。
(Informing player ship will soon undock)飞船即将离港。
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)我在等待你的起飞指令。
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)如果你要起飞，请告诉我。
有艘飞船正在准备离港。
离港飞船，你已被授权离港。一路平安。
使用这些条件进行搜索。
我找到了与搜索条件相匹配的贸易要约。
告诉那个空间站我们正在路上。
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)应用到哪艘飞船上？
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)也许是这里。
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)这可真是一次大升级！
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)Split快准备好了。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)接下来给Split什么任务？
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)没发现什么！走吧！
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)Split准备好被扫描了！
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)当然！Split是诚实的公民！
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)这是别人的东西！
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)Split要看看！瞧瞧你装了什么！
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)你什么都没有！
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)拿走货物！
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)Split同意你把船拿走。
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。
(station / ship hacked)看起来我们被骇入了。
(station security saw suspicious activity)发现可疑活动。
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)安保船只正在上报可疑的活动。
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)派出增援安保船只。
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)出动应急分队的战斗机。
确保工作人员知道哪里要去修理。
(call to security forces - minor)留意所有可疑的动向。
(call to security forces - major)立即向我们汇报所有可疑动向。
(call to security forces - search)搜索可疑的动向。
我在这里发现了些东西。
我们在这里发现了些东西。
我们没有可用的收集无人机。
正在扫描我们周边的小行星。
只寻找我们的目标资源。
(NPC moves onto player\'s ship)我登上了你的飞船并做好了出发准备。
(NPC moves off player ship)Split现在要走了。祝你愉快。
(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。
(pod attached)开始接敌。准备攻入敌方船体。
(marine lost during breach)出现人员伤亡！需要提防出现在船体上的反抗！
其中一支小队被压制了。
(lots of fighting noise)我们伤亡惨重。
(lots of fighting noise)我们正在推进。途中遭遇很多抵抗。
我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官死了。我们的战线正在崩溃！
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！
(emergency event mission offer)我现在真的需要一些帮助。
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)我冒着巨大风险发出信号，所以如果你破解了这个信号，请保守秘密。我这儿有事相求。
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)有人能听到我吗？喂？！我本不应该这样广播求救的，但我真的需要帮助！拜托！我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)会有人在这里吗？我需要帮助！拜托，如果你能听到这个，我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)在附近发现走私船。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的违禁品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法商品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法数据。
(player looks at offer - generic)有兴趣接个工作吗？
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)对你来说应该没有任何难度。
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)你需要运用你的智慧。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)你破解了我的信号。很好。
(player looks at illegal mission offer)这对我们双方都有好处的。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)我很高兴你找到了我的信号。
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)希望你能帮忙！
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)所以你还有兴趣吗？
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)我知道你不会拒绝的。
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)你回来了？这意味着你会帮忙吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)突袭马上要开始了。你来吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)Split随时准备突袭。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)这个你要买不？Split没法再留着它了！
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)OK。Split到站里老地方等你。你在那儿和Split碰头。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)Split会把东西放在保险柜里，然后给你坐标。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)Split现在正忙。一会儿再去拿。
(player declines mission offer)如果你改变主意，回来找我。
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)啊......你会回来的。我敢肯定。
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)什么？不！拜托！
(player accepts mission offer)我就知道我可以指望你。
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)好吧。如果你认为你有能力完成这个任务。
(player accepts illegal opportunity)明智之举。别搞砸了。
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)谢谢！祝你好运！
(partial success)如果这就是你能做的最好的…...好吧，就这样。
(failed mission)我希望你不会妄想得到报酬。
(success in mission chain)我们离完成还有一步之遥。
(failure in mission chain)进展并不顺利，但还有挽救的余地。
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)抱歉。看起来不再需要你的帮助了。
你随他们一起，我会进一步调查。
伙计，那个Boron不在那艘船上。返回基地。
我们可算找到你了，Boron渣滓！
我们要把这个空间站占为己有！
你将会为你对我兄弟做的那些事付出代价！

page.title: Split NPC Female 1 / Split 2 rep / Misc Plot Characters
page.descr: Lines for Split NPC Female 1 and Miscellaneous story characters using that voice
page.t: (Greeting - trader / staff)有什么我能帮忙的吗？
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)我们之间没什么好谈的。
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
该请求来自于警用船只。
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)快带我们离开这！
(announced to crew)我们收到了新的命令。
(chosen reward)请挑选一样作为谢礼吧。
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)Split觉得你很滑稽！
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)Split才不会这么轻易放弃！
(\'official\' reward)你会得到恰当的回报的。
(first warning - generic)我们无法容忍你的行为。
(first warning to an attacking ship)立即停止你的的攻击。
(warning of consequences - generic)你将自食其果。
(warning of consequences - opening fire)你脑袋已经在靶心上了。
(warning of consequences - sending ships)飞船正在出动。
(warning of consequences - reporting)我们已经报警了。
(report of attack - ships)正在上报针对本舰的攻击行为。
(report of attack - stations)正在上报针对本站的攻击行为。
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)犯罪记录已更新。
(report of attack generic)正在上报犯罪行为。
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)你很合作！明智的决定！
(ship does not comply)你选择拒绝服从。
(reporting)这里是星系守备部队，正在上报犯罪活动。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)你小心！星区守备部队正在巡逻。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)安保巡逻队！怎么办？
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)把货物丢了！
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)Split很高兴你按命令去做了！
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们被击中了。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)有东西击中了我们。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们在挨打。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)他们还不足以厉害到打败Split！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)Split可以轻易打穿他们的防御！
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续攻击当前目标。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续集火这个目标。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Split嗅到了胜利的味道！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)和Split对抗，他们毫无机会!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)战斗不太顺利！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Split马上准备好要撤退了！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)这根本就不光荣！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)这可不妙！
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)钳鱼都是比你更好的飞行员！
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)你可别想活着回去了！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Split还不想死！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)你能发发善心吗？Split这里有很多船员。
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)我们已经完蛋了！现在杀了我们得不到任何荣誉。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)你可以放Split一条生路吗？
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)不要再打了！Split投降！
(fleeing from combat)撑不住了！Split要赶紧撤！
(relief line)Split庆幸我们总算活下来了。
(congratulations after combat from captain)同志们，打得好！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)我们收到了新的攻击指令！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)新攻击命令！
(preparing new attack orders)准备对目标开火！
(preparing new attack orders during combat)集火这个目标！
(reaction to friendly fire)兄弟，能不能停手？
(reaction to friendly fire)你快把我的盾打穿了！
(enemy ship or station exploding)它要爆了！
(ship taking shield damage)护盾遭到攻击。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)下次再努努力！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)Split可没这么容易被打败！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)这根本撼动不了Split!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)Split会让你后悔的！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)攻击Split是个坏主意！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)够不够？Split还可以给你再多吃几发！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你根本别想赢。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Split让你死个痛快！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)你完了！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Split现在好怕怕啊！哈哈哈哈！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Split觉得你在开玩笑！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你这样根本入不了Split的法眼！
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)不可能！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)非常抱歉！Split打偏了！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)机器打中了Split！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)这还不足以杀死Split！
(variant)(losing an enemy)Split要腾出空间来战斗！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)可怕！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)你在浪费子弹！Split感到很无聊！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)你还没见识到厉害的呢！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Split要消灭你！希望你准备好了！
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。

(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)马上就能弄好。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)还有更多任务让Split去做吗？
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)扫描没有什么发现！你可以走了！
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)没问题！随你扫。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)你居然会惊讶？Split可不这么觉得！
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)这你不应该会发现的！
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)今天你为Split准备了什么？
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)什么也没有！
(variant)(ship scan result)有趣的东西，也许Split可以留着它。
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)拿了货物快走！
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)船给你了。
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。

(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Promotion ceremony - intro)你亲自来真是太好了。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, friendly)我们一直以极大的兴趣关注着你的工作，并打算对你进行奖励。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, allied)我们很高兴你继续和我们一起工作，并打算回报你的努力。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', friendly)我很高兴地授予你在我们组织中的新等级。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', allied)很荣幸能授予你在我们组织中的新等级。
(Promotion ceremony)当然了，这个等级伴随着巨大的福利。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 1)福利是与等级挂钩的，因此如果你失去了官衔，这些福利也就没了。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 2)不过以你的记录，我相信我们根本不用担心那个。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 3)我们希望这些奖励能对得起你的付出，好好利用它们吧。
(Promotion ceremony - subgroup licence hint)噢对了，你或许还会发现我们麾下的一些组织也会很乐意让你加入他们的行列。
(Promotion ceremony - outro)再一次感谢你所作的努力。
(Promotion ceremony - outro cntd)我们期待将来与你进行更多合作。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。
(pod attached)开始接敌。准备攻入敌方船体。
(marine lost during breach)出现人员伤亡！需要提防出现在船体上的反抗！
其中一支小队被压制了。
(lots of fighting noise)我们伤亡惨重。
(lots of fighting noise)我们正在推进。途中遭遇很多抵抗。
我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官死了。我们的战线正在崩溃！
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！
(emergency event mission offer)我现在真的需要一些帮助。
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)我冒着巨大风险发出信号，所以如果你破解了这个信号，请保守秘密。我这儿有事相求。
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)有人能听到我吗？喂？！我本不应该这样广播求救的，但我真的需要帮助！拜托！我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)会有人在这里吗？我需要帮助！拜托，如果你能听到这个，我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)在附近发现走私船。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的违禁品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法商品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法数据。
(player looks at offer - generic)有兴趣接个工作吗？
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)对你来说应该没有任何难度。
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)你需要运用你的智慧。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)你破解了我的信号。很好。
(player looks at illegal mission offer)这对我们双方都有好处的。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)我很高兴你找到了我的信号。
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)希望你能帮忙！
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)所以你还有兴趣吗？
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)我知道你不会拒绝的。
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)你回来了？这意味着你会帮忙吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)你想参加突袭吗？也许我们能赚点小钱！
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)好！希望你手底下有优秀的飞行员。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)Split需要处理掉这些玩意儿。你要买么？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)成交。在站里的老地方碰头。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)东西就放在不远处的保险柜里了。Split给你坐标。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)Split准备好了就去取。
(player declines mission offer)如果你改变主意，回来找我。
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)啊......你会回来的。我敢肯定。
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)什么？不！拜托！
(player accepts mission offer)我就知道我可以指望你。
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)好吧。如果你认为你有能力完成这个任务。
(player accepts illegal opportunity)明智之举。别搞砸了。
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)谢谢！祝你好运！
(partial success)如果这就是你能做的最好的…...好吧，就这样。
(failed mission)我希望你不会妄想得到报酬。
(success in mission chain)我们离完成还有一步之遥。
(failure in mission chain)进展并不顺利，但还有挽救的余地。
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)抱歉。看起来不再需要你的帮助了。

page.title: Split NPC Female 2
page.descr: Lines for Split NPC Female 2
page.t: (Greeting - trader / staff)有什么我能帮忙的吗？
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)我们之间没什么好谈的。
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
该请求来自于警用船只。
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)快带我们离开这！
(announced to crew)我们收到了新的命令。
(chosen reward)请挑选一样作为谢礼吧。
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)Split觉得你是在开玩笑！
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)Split将继续战斗！
(\'official\' reward)你会得到恰当的回报的。
(first warning - generic)我们无法容忍你的行为。
(first warning to an attacking ship)立即停止你的的攻击。
(warning of consequences - generic)你将自食其果。
(warning of consequences - opening fire)你脑袋已经在靶心上了。
(warning of consequences - sending ships)飞船正在出动。
(warning of consequences - reporting)我们已经报警了。
(report of attack - ships)正在上报针对本舰的攻击行为。
(report of attack - stations)正在上报针对本站的攻击行为。
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)犯罪记录已更新。
(report of attack generic)正在上报犯罪行为。
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)Split很高兴你乖乖合作了。
(ship does not comply)你选择拒绝服从。
(reporting)这里是星系守备部队，正在上报犯罪活动。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)小心别给安保抓住。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)被抓了！怎么办？
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)快把货扔了，快点！
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)这票很简单啊！
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们被击中了。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)有东西击中了我们。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们在挨打。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)我们向他们展示了Split是如何战斗的！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)看起来他们坚持不了太久。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续攻击当前目标。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续集火这个目标。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Split不听！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)我们击垮了他们！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)情况糟糕！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Split需要想办法脱离！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Split有生命危险！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)不！不！不！
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)你根本不是对手！Split要灭了你！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)请不要杀Split！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Split想活下去！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Split求你大发慈悲。
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)我们快不行了。你可以不要打了吧？
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Split不想死，求求你了！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Split投降！你可以绕我一命吗？
(fleeing from combat)撑不住了！Split要赶紧撤！
(relief line)Split庆幸我们总算活下来了。
(congratulations after combat from captain)同志们，打得好！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)我们收到了新的攻击指令！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)新攻击命令！
(preparing new attack orders)准备对目标开火！
(preparing new attack orders during combat)集火这个目标！
(reaction to friendly fire)兄弟，能不能停手？
(reaction to friendly fire)你快把我的盾打穿了！
(enemy ship or station exploding)它要爆了！
(ship taking shield damage)护盾遭到攻击。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)你没造成多大的伤害！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)刚刚那下可惹不到Split！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)再试试！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)Split让你付出代价！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)严重的错误！也许是你这辈子能犯的最后一个错误！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)Split手上有着更多炮弹！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你根本不是我们的对手。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Split可以很快就解决你！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)说再见吧！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你是在侮辱Split么？
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)这……很有趣吗？
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Split毫不在意！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你就这点本事？
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)我不能死！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)Split犯错了！你不是目标！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)这台机器真TM讨厌！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)有本事再用点力！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)不行！你还得打得再用力点！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)这准头也太差了！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)Split刚刚开始热身而已！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Split赐给你体面的战死！
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)那个，我们做个交易怎么样？
(variant)(NPC fired)真遗憾！Split喜欢在这里工作。
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。
该指令可能需要更长时间完成。
将新坐标分发到各僚舰上。
所有船只到达后向我报告。
报告：所有船只已到达指定位置。
(grateful)没有你我们是不可能成功的。
(during combat)保持阵型，我们需要支援，现在！
(group of small ships - winning)我们正在碾压他们！
(group of small ships - winning)我们压制住了他们！
(group of small ships - losing)我们完全处于下风。
(group of small ships - losing)我们快承受不住了。
(response to distress call - singular)坚持住，我来了！
(response to distress call - plural)我们已收到你的请求，正在前往。
请按引导停靠至指定位置。
他们已为我们划定停靠位置。
请按照信号将飞船对齐。
你的到来是我们的荣幸。
我们衷心欢迎你的到来。
(Informing player ship will soon undock)飞船即将离港。
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)我在等待你的起飞指令。
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)如果你要起飞，请告诉我。
有艘飞船正在准备离港。
离港飞船，你已被授权离港。一路平安。
使用这些条件进行搜索。
我找到了与搜索条件相匹配的贸易要约。
告诉那个空间站我们正在路上。
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)应用到哪艘飞船上？
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)这里？
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)Split马上就准备好了。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)还有别的工作吗?
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)船上很干净！准予放行！
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)Split接受你的扫描！
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)Split早就知道！
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)离我的货远点！
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)Split觉得你应该装了什么好东西！
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)空空如也！
(variant)(ship scan result)这艘船的油水可比前面那个多多了。
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)Split把货舱里的东西全给你。
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)船给你了！
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。
(station / ship hacked)看起来我们被骇入了。
(station security saw suspicious activity)发现可疑活动。
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)安保船只正在上报可疑的活动。
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)派出增援安保船只。
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)出动应急分队的战斗机。
确保工作人员知道哪里要去修理。
(call to security forces - minor)留意所有可疑的动向。
(call to security forces - major)立即向我们汇报所有可疑动向。
(call to security forces - search)搜索可疑的动向。
我在这里发现了些东西。
我们在这里发现了些东西。
我们没有可用的收集无人机。
正在扫描我们周边的小行星。
只寻找我们的目标资源。

(NPC moves off player ship)Split要走了，祝你愉快。
(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。

其中一支小队被压制了。

我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官死了。我们的战线正在崩溃！
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！

(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。

(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)成交！到站里的老地方碰头，Split在那里等你。

(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们被击中了。

(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)我不想死！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)求你别开火了。
(pilot bailing from ship)用我的船换我一命！
(relief line)能幸免于难让我松了一口气。
(congratulations after combat from captain)同志们，打得好！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)我们收到了新的攻击指令！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)新攻击命令！
(preparing new attack orders)准备对目标开火！
(preparing new attack orders during combat)集火这个目标！
(reaction to friendly fire)兄弟，能不能停手？
(reaction to friendly fire)你快把我的盾打穿了！
(enemy ship or station exploding)它要爆了！
(ship taking shield damage)护盾遭到攻击。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)如果你就是这水平，那简直太好笑了。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)刚才那下弱得可以忽略不计。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)这条飞船还硬着呢！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)这不是个明智的决定，飞行员。
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)这是个错误，飞行员。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)啊哈，我可以给你来点更狠的。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)这对我们来说很简单。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)你要损失惨重了。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)所以，这就是永别。
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)愚蠢的威胁！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你的威胁虚有其表！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)我不怕你！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)没什么了不起的。
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)绝对不可能！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)十分抱歉！我不是故意对你开火的。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)这个机器对捞钱是个威胁。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)不会让你轻松得逞。
(variant)(torpedo use)这颗鱼雷要派上用场了。
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)你的弱点太明显了！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)这下太弱了！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)这只是个开始。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)向我们开火，你是活腻了么？
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)我有一个对你有利的提议。
(variant)(NPC bribe succeeds)很好。我们一起来捞钱吧。
(variant)(NPC hired)我会竭尽所能，为公司谋取最大的利益。
(variant)(NPC fired)不管怎样，祝你的公司生意兴隆。
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。
该指令可能需要更长时间完成。
将新坐标分发到各僚舰上。
所有船只到达后向我报告。
报告：所有船只已到达指定位置。
(grateful)没有你我们是不可能成功的。
(during combat)保持阵型，我们需要支援，现在！
(group of small ships - winning)我们正在碾压他们！
(group of small ships - winning)我们压制住了他们！
(group of small ships - losing)我们完全处于下风。
(group of small ships - losing)我们快承受不住了。
(response to distress call - singular)坚持住，我来了！
(response to distress call - plural)我们已收到你的请求，正在前往。
请按引导停靠至指定位置。
他们已为我们划定停靠位置。
请按照信号将飞船对齐。
你的到来是我们的荣幸。
我们衷心欢迎你的到来。
(Informing player ship will soon undock)飞船即将离港。
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)我在等待你的起飞指令。
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)如果你要起飞，请告诉我。
有艘飞船正在准备离港。
离港飞船，你已被授权离港。一路平安。
使用这些条件进行搜索。
我找到了与搜索条件相匹配的贸易要约。
告诉那个空间站我们正在路上。
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)应用到哪艘飞船上？
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)可能是在这边吧。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)快搞定了。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)我现在该干点什么？
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)你的扫描没有问题。祝你财源滚滚。
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)行行行，你扫吧。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)太好了！有问题的话，生意就要受影响了。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)我运什么关你屁事！
(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)停下！你这是违法扫描。
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)让我们看看你的货物。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)啥都没有？那赚个毛线的钱啊！
(variant)(ship scan result)这批货将给我带来丰厚的利润。
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)拿走我的货吧，还有我的利润！
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)我的船是归你了吧！
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。
(station / ship hacked)看起来我们被骇入了。
(station security saw suspicious activity)发现可疑活动。
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)安保船只正在上报可疑的活动。
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)派出增援安保船只。
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)出动应急分队的战斗机。
确保工作人员知道哪里要去修理。
(call to security forces - minor)留意所有可疑的动向。
(call to security forces - major)立即向我们汇报所有可疑动向。
(call to security forces - search)搜索可疑的动向。
我在这里发现了些东西。
我们在这里发现了些东西。
我们没有可用的收集无人机。
正在扫描我们周边的小行星。
只寻找我们的目标资源。
(NPC moves onto player\'s ship)我登上了你的飞船并做好了出发准备。
(NPC moves off player ship)谢谢你载我一程，再见。
(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Promotion ceremony - intro)我很高兴能与你面对面交流。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, friendly)我们对你的行动很感兴趣，并且相信你值得投资。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, allied)我们很高兴之前对你的关注有所收获。你表现得很好，值得奖赏。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', friendly)我很高兴授予你在我们公司中新的等级。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', allied)很荣幸能授予你在我们公司中新的等级。
(Promotion ceremony)当然了，这个等级伴随着巨大的福利。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 1)这些福利和你的等级紧密相关。所以，你如果失去这个等级，好处也没了。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 2)但是，根据你的履历和我们的信任，我相信我们不需要担心这个。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 3)我希望你觉得这些奖励和你的付出相符。希望它们给你创造跟多财富。
(Promotion ceremony - subgroup licence hint)升职以后，你能在我们管辖下的一些组织中找到新的机遇。它们值得你关注一下。
(Promotion ceremony - outro)对你的努力再次表示感谢。
(Promotion ceremony - outro cntd)希望未来我们可以继续合作。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(on failure, somber)我们今天的损失实在难以承受。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。
(pod attached)开始接敌。准备攻入敌方船体。
(marine lost during breach)出现人员伤亡！需要提防出现在船体上的反抗！
其中一支小队被压制了。
(lots of fighting noise)我们伤亡惨重。
(lots of fighting noise)我们正在推进。途中遭遇很多抵抗。
我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官死了。我们的防线正在瓦解。
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！
(emergency event mission offer)我现在真的需要一些帮助。
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)我冒着巨大风险发出信号，所以如果你破解了这个信号，请保守秘密。我这儿有事相求。
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)有人能听到我吗？喂？！我本不应该这样广播求救的，但我真的需要帮助！拜托！我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)会有人在这里吗？我需要帮助！拜托，如果你能听到这个，我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)在附近发现走私船。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的违禁品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法商品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法数据。
(player looks at offer - generic)有兴趣接个工作吗？
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)对你来说应该没有任何难度。
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)你需要运用你的智慧。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)你破解了我的信号。很好。
(player looks at illegal mission offer)这对我们双方都有好处的。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)我很高兴你找到了我的信号。
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)希望你能帮忙！
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)所以你还有兴趣吗？
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)我知道你不会拒绝的。
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)你回来了？这意味着你会帮忙吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)你和我们一起来吗？我们正寻求机会，马上就出发了。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)我加入。听起来这一次可以大赚一笔。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)这些物品有着很高的潜在利润，但是我不能冒险带着它们。你想不想和我做笔交易？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)行，我们来谈谈。去我在这个空间站的老地方。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)在这些坐标上有保险柜，东西就在里面。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)我会尽快去取得它们的。
(player declines mission offer)如果你改变主意，回来找我。
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)啊......你会回来的。我敢肯定。
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)什么？不！拜托！
(player accepts mission offer)我就知道我可以指望你。
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)好吧。如果你认为你有能力完成这个任务。
(player accepts illegal opportunity)明智之举。别搞砸了。
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)谢谢！祝你好运！
(partial success)如果这就是你能做的最好的…...好吧，就这样。
(failed mission)我希望你不会妄想得到报酬。
(success in mission chain)我们离完成还有一步之遥。
(failure in mission chain)进展并不顺利，但还有挽救的余地。
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)抱歉。看起来不再需要你的帮助了。

page.title: Teladi NPC 2 / Ministry rep
page.descr: Lines for Teladi NPC 2
page.t: (Metadata, do not translate)[teladi] male female basic
(Greeting - trader / staff)有什么我能帮忙的吗？
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)我们之间没什么好谈的。
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
该请求来自于警用船只。
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)快带我们离开这！
(variant)(refusal to do something)不，生意不是这样做的。
(announced to crew)我们收到了新的命令。
(chosen reward)请挑选一样作为谢礼吧。
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)你不是认真的吧？
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)我可不会那么轻易放弃！
(\'official\' reward)你会得到恰当的回报的。
(first warning - generic)我们无法容忍你的行为。
(first warning to an attacking ship)立即停止你的的攻击。
(warning of consequences - generic)你将自食其果。
(warning of consequences - opening fire)你脑袋已经在靶心上了。
(warning of consequences - sending ships)飞船正在出动。
(warning of consequences - reporting)我们已经报警了。
(report of attack - ships)正在上报针对本舰的攻击行为。
(report of attack - stations)正在上报针对本站的攻击行为。
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)犯罪记录已更新。
(report of attack generic)正在上报犯罪行为。
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)这么做就对了。
(ship does not comply)你选择拒绝服从。
(reporting)这里是星系守备部队，正在上报犯罪活动。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)小心点。星区守备部队可能会巡查这片区域。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)守备部队发现我们了！接下来咋办？
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)把它扔到太空里！
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)钱来的这么容易真是爽！
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们被击中了。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)有东西击中了我们。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们在挨打。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)让他们瞧瞧我们的厉害！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)他们的防御拦不住我们。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续攻击当前目标。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续集火这个目标。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)让他们见鬼去吧！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)被摧毁之后他们就啥都赚不到了！
(variant)(retaliation)跟我们过不去我们也不会让你好过！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)哎哟妈呀！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)救命！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)我的钱！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)求你了，快住手！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)饶了我吧！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)放我条生路吧！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)我们求你放条生路！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)我们的船快撑不住了！放过我们吧！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)放我条生路，求你了！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)求你了，赶紧停手。
(pilot bailing from ship)用我的船换我的命！
(congratulations after combat from captain)同志们，打得好！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)我们收到了新的攻击指令！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)新攻击命令！
(preparing new attack orders)准备对目标开火！
(preparing new attack orders during combat)集火这个目标！
(reaction to friendly fire)兄弟，能不能停手？
(reaction to friendly fire)你快把我的盾打穿了！
(enemy ship or station exploding)它要爆了！
(ship taking shield damage)护盾遭到攻击。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)不过如此嘛。你就这点能耐？
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)我的钱可没那么好赚。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)你还差得远了。
(variant)(enemy destroyed - taunt)这下你的账户可以注销了。
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)伙计，你从我这可赚不到钱。
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)这下你做错事了。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)还想来？行，行，没问题！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)这个简单。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)要不了多久你就完蛋了。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)你走到尽头了！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)我可不这么想。
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)别光说不练！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你可吓不了我！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你就那点能耐？
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)想得美！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)抱歉。不是有意要攻击你。
(variant)(taunt - xenon)看我不把你打成破铜烂铁！
(variant)(taunt - silent enemy)是时候滚回娘胎去了！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)一个机器可不该打得这么准。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)我可不是吃素的。
(variant)(threat)这个也许能让你重新考虑一下！
(variant)(threat)这招可比你那些小伎俩强多了！
(variant)(torpedo use)那么，让我试试这鱼雷吧。
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)你打得跟小屁孩一样！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)这个我搞得定。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)我这才刚开始。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你的飞船马上就会变成太空尘埃！
(variant)(NPC hired)谢谢。相信我能为你的公司带来很多好处。
(variant)(NPC fired)知道了。那我就去找别的合作伙伴了。
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。
该指令可能需要更长时间完成。
将新坐标分发到各僚舰上。
所有船只到达后向我报告。
报告：所有船只已到达指定位置。
(grateful)没有你我们是不可能成功的。
(during combat)保持阵型，我们需要支援，现在！
(group of small ships - winning)我们正在碾压他们！
(group of small ships - winning)我们压制住了他们！
(group of small ships - losing)我们完全处于下风。
(group of small ships - losing)我们快承受不住了。
(response to distress call - singular)坚持住，我来了！
(response to distress call - plural)我们已收到你的请求，正在前往。
请按引导停靠至指定位置。
他们已为我们划定停靠位置。
请按照信号将飞船对齐。
你的到来是我们的荣幸。
我们衷心欢迎你的到来。
(Informing player ship will soon undock)飞船即将离港。
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)我在等待你的起飞指令。
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)如果你要起飞，请告诉我。
有艘飞船正在准备离港。
离港飞船，你已被授权离港。一路平安。
使用这些条件进行搜索。
我找到了与搜索条件相匹配的贸易要约。
告诉那个空间站我们正在路上。
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)应用到哪艘飞船上？
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)我是不是把它落在这了？
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)就快完成了。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)我怎样才能将你的利益最大化呢？
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)扫描结果正常。
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)你可以进行扫描了。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)好的。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)可惜了。我本打算靠那个好好赚一笔的。
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)我只是要看看你货舱里有些什么。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)居然是空的，太可惜了！
(variant)(ship scan result)至少对我来说，这些货可有的赚了。
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)拿去吧，你个败家玩意儿！
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)我的船归你了，混蛋！
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。
(station / ship hacked)看起来我们被骇入了。
(station security saw suspicious activity)发现可疑活动。
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)安保船只正在上报可疑的活动。
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)派出增援安保船只。
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)出动应急分队的战斗机。
确保工作人员知道哪里要去修理。
(call to security forces - minor)留意所有可疑的动向。
(call to security forces - major)立即向我们汇报所有可疑动向。
(call to security forces - search)搜索可疑的动向。
我在这里发现了些东西。
我们在这里发现了些东西。
我们没有可用的收集无人机。
正在扫描我们周边的小行星。
只寻找我们的目标资源。
(NPC moves onto player\'s ship)我登上了你的飞船并做好了出发准备。
(NPC moves off player ship)这趟多谢了。后会有期。
(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Promotion ceremony - intro)你亲自前来是个明智的决定。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, friendly)经过仔细的考察，我们认为你是位值得我们感谢和奖励的有功之臣。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, allied)你一直以来的努力让你的同僚，包括我在内，都深感骄傲。我们希望以一种更为瞩目的方式认可你的成绩。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', friendly)我很高兴地授予你在财政部中的新等级。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', allied)我很荣幸地授予你在财政部中的新等级。
(Promotion ceremony)你应该能想象，这个等级将为你带来更为可观的福利。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 1)这些福利和你的等级紧密相关。如果你背叛了财政部，你不只会失去这些福利，还会失去所有的合作意向。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 2)以你的记录来看，我相信这种情况不会发生。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 3)我们希望这些奖励能对得起你的付出。为自己喝彩并继续努力吧。
(Promotion ceremony - subgroup licence hint)另外，你或许还会发现我们麾下的一些组织也非常乐见你加入他们的行列。
(Promotion ceremony - outro)再次感谢你所做的努力。
(Promotion ceremony - outro cntd)我们期待将来与你进行更多合作。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(on failure, somber)今天我们损失惨重。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。
(pod attached)开始接敌。准备攻入敌方船体。
(marine lost during breach)出现人员伤亡！需要提防出现在船体上的反抗！
其中一支小队被压制了。
(lots of fighting noise)我们伤亡惨重。
(lots of fighting noise)我们正在推进。途中遭遇很多抵抗。
我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官阵亡了。我们的防线正在崩溃。
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！
(emergency event mission offer)我现在真的需要一些帮助。
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)我冒着巨大风险发出信号，所以如果你破解了这个信号，请保守秘密。我这儿有事相求。
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)有人能听到我吗？喂？！我本不应该这样广播求救的，但我真的需要帮助！拜托！我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)会有人在这里吗？我需要帮助！拜托，如果你能听到这个，我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)在附近发现走私船。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的违禁品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法商品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法数据。
(player looks at offer - generic)有兴趣接个工作吗？
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)对你来说应该没有任何难度。
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)你需要运用你的智慧。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)你破解了我的信号。很好。
(player looks at illegal mission offer)这对我们双方都有好处的。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)我很高兴你找到了我的信号。
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)希望你能帮忙！
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)所以你还有兴趣吗？
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)我知道你不会拒绝的。
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)你回来了？这意味着你会帮忙吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)愿意加入我们么？我们期待着新的…商机。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)我会加入你们集团。虽然风险很高，但潜在的回报也十分可观。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)这些高危物品的利润可观。是否愿意合作？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)我认为我们有合作的可能。我们就在这个空间站的老地方见。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)在这些坐标附近有一个保险柜放着那些物品。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)等我其他事情忙完了就会尽快去把它们取回。
(player declines mission offer)如果你改变主意，回来找我。
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)啊......你会回来的。我敢肯定。
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)什么？不！拜托！
(player accepts mission offer)我就知道我可以指望你。
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)好吧。如果你认为你有能力完成这个任务。
(player accepts illegal opportunity)明智之举。别搞砸了。
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)谢谢！祝你好运！
(partial success)如果这就是你能做的最好的…...好吧，就这样。
(failed mission)我希望你不会妄想得到报酬。
(success in mission chain)我们离完成还有一步之遥。
(failure in mission chain)进展并不顺利，但还有挽救的余地。
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)抱歉。看起来不再需要你的帮助了。

page.title: Teladi NPC 3 / Scaleplate rep
page.descr: Lines for Teladi NPC 3
page.t: (Metadata, do not translate)[teladi] male female basic
(Greeting - trader / staff)有什么我能帮忙的吗？
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)我们之间没什么好谈的。
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
该请求来自于警用船只。
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)快带我们离开这！
(variant)(refusal to do something)我是不会这么干的。
(announced to crew)我们收到了新的命令。
(chosen reward)请挑选一样作为谢礼吧。
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)这是在搞笑么？
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)休想！我是不会投降的。
(\'official\' reward)你会得到恰当的回报的。
(first warning - generic)我们无法容忍你的行为。
(first warning to an attacking ship)立即停止你的的攻击。
(warning of consequences - generic)你将自食其果。
(warning of consequences - opening fire)你脑袋已经在靶心上了。
(warning of consequences - sending ships)飞船正在出动。
(warning of consequences - reporting)我们已经报警了。
(report of attack - ships)正在上报针对本舰的攻击行为。
(report of attack - stations)正在上报针对本站的攻击行为。
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)犯罪记录已更新。
(report of attack generic)正在上报犯罪行为。
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)你做出了最明智的选择。
(ship does not comply)你选择拒绝服从。
(reporting)这里是星系守备部队，正在上报犯罪活动。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)注意星区守备部队。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)我们被发现了。怎么办？
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)把货处理掉！
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)我很高兴你没有让事情复杂化。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们被击中了。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)有东西击中了我们。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们在挨打。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)他们的软弱能让我们获利！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)他们马上就要从生意场上滚蛋了！
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续攻击当前目标。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续集火这个目标。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)不用回复他们。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)把他们的户口注销掉！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)这可不妙！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)救命啊！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)这真是令人不爽！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)快停手！
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)你的收支表看起来不太秒啊！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)好汉饶命！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)请不要再打啦！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)请饶了我们吧！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)我们的飞船差不多要沉了，饶我们一命！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)饶我一命吧，求你了！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)我不想就这么死啊！饶命啊！
(pilot bailing from ship)用我的船换我的命！
(congratulations after combat from captain)同志们，打得好！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)我们收到了新的攻击指令！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)新攻击命令！
(preparing new attack orders)准备对目标开火！
(preparing new attack orders during combat)集火这个目标！
(reaction to friendly fire)兄弟，能不能停手？
(reaction to friendly fire)你快把我的盾打穿了！
(enemy ship or station exploding)它要爆了！
(ship taking shield damage)护盾遭到攻击。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)这点小动静，伤不到我多少利润。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)还以为你有多厉害呢。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)你就这点本事？
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)你要为此付出代价！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)真是愚蠢的举动！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)我们走着瞧！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)在我们面前，你根本就不是对手！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)我会让你死得痛快！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)说出你的遗言！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)随你耍嘴皮子，飞行员。
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你闯大祸了！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)我可不怕你。
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)我都没有注意到你说的话。
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)我不这么认为！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)真的非常抱歉！我瞄偏了。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)这个破玩意真的激怒我了。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)我可不是那么容易就被日的！
(variant)(torpedo use)让他们尝尝鱼雷的滋味。
(variant)(losing an enemy)是时候甩掉这堆讨厌的家伙了！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)你不会得逞的！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)这种程度，都别想在我的鳞片上都留下印子！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)这只是开始！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你基本上死定了。
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)也许我们可以做个交易？
(variant)(NPC hired)我将竭尽所能，最大化您的利润。
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。
该指令可能需要更长时间完成。
将新坐标分发到各僚舰上。
所有船只到达后向我报告。
报告：所有船只已到达指定位置。
(grateful)没有你我们是不可能成功的。
(during combat)保持阵型，我们需要支援，现在！
(group of small ships - winning)我们正在碾压他们！
(group of small ships - winning)我们压制住了他们！
(group of small ships - losing)我们完全处于下风。
(group of small ships - losing)我们快承受不住了。
(response to distress call - singular)坚持住，我来了！
(response to distress call - plural)我们已收到你的请求，正在前往。
请按引导停靠至指定位置。
他们已为我们划定停靠位置。
请按照信号将飞船对齐。
你的到来是我们的荣幸。
我们衷心欢迎你的到来。
(Informing player ship will soon undock)飞船即将离港。
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)我在等待你的起飞指令。
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)如果你要起飞，请告诉我。
有艘飞船正在准备离港。
离港飞船，你已被授权离港。一路平安。
使用这些条件进行搜索。
我找到了与搜索条件相匹配的贸易要约。
告诉那个空间站我们正在路上。
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)应用到哪艘飞船上？
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)放哪儿了？
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)有了很大的提升。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)马上就好。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)还有别的事需要我做吗？
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)扫描完成，你可以走了。
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)来吧，扫描吧。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)你好像很失望的样子。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)无论那是啥，肯定不是我的。
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)好，让我们看看你都装了什么。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)真可惜，什么都没有。
(variant)(ship scan result)这东西看起来不错，我要了。
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)货你拿走！请放我一条生路。
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)我就剩下这艘船了，给你！
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。
(station / ship hacked)看起来我们被骇入了。
(station security saw suspicious activity)发现可疑活动。
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)安保船只正在上报可疑的活动。
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)派出增援安保船只。
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)出动应急分队的战斗机。
确保工作人员知道哪里要去修理。
(call to security forces - minor)留意所有可疑的动向。
(call to security forces - major)立即向我们汇报所有可疑动向。
(call to security forces - search)搜索可疑的动向。
我在这里发现了些东西。
我们在这里发现了些东西。
我们没有可用的收集无人机。
正在扫描我们周边的小行星。
只寻找我们的目标资源。
(NPC moves onto player\'s ship)我登上了你的飞船并做好了出发准备。
(NPC moves off player ship)这趟多谢了。后会有期。
(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Promotion ceremony - intro)你胆子真大，敢亲自前来。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, friendly)我们已经关注你一段时间。你显然是值得我们信任的人，得好好回报你才行。
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, allied)你一直和我们并肩作战，用行动去践行我们的理念。有如我们公约中描述的那般高尚人格。认可不是免费赠予而是挣来的。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', friendly)我很高兴地授予你在我们组织中的新等级。
(Promotion ceremony - handing over \'medal\', allied)很荣幸能授予你在我们组织中的新等级。
(Promotion ceremony)当然了，这个等级伴随着一系列的福利。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 1)倘若你背叛公约，这些福利和那些我们曾经给你提供的保护都会撤消。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 2)但以我看人的眼光，我相信不会发生那种事。否则，我会感到痛心，和极度的愤怒。
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 3)你应该会觉得这些奖励对得起你的付出。我希望它们能在你继续追随我们的信条时为你提供更多自由。
(Promotion ceremony - subgroup licence hint)别声张。你也许会发现公约中的某些组织有兴趣让你加入他们的行列。放聪明点。
(Promotion ceremony - outro)再一次感谢你所作的努力。
(Promotion ceremony - outro cntd)我们期待将来与你进行更多合作。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(on failure, somber)我们今天的损失是无法弥补的。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。
(pod attached)开始接敌。准备攻入敌方船体。
(marine lost during breach)出现人员伤亡！需要提防出现在船体上的反抗！
其中一支小队被压制了。
(lots of fighting noise)我们伤亡惨重。
(lots of fighting noise)我们正在推进。途中遭遇很多抵抗。
我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官阵亡了。我们的防线正在崩溃。
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！
(emergency event mission offer)我现在真的需要一些帮助。
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)我冒着巨大风险发出信号，所以如果你破解了这个信号，请保守秘密。我这儿有事相求。
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)有人能听到我吗？喂？！我本不应该这样广播求救的，但我真的需要帮助！拜托！我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)会有人在这里吗？我需要帮助！拜托，如果你能听到这个，我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)在附近发现走私船。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的违禁品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法商品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法数据。
(player looks at offer - generic)有兴趣接个工作吗？
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)对你来说应该没有任何难度。
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)你需要运用你的智慧。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)你破解了我的信号。很好。
(player looks at illegal mission offer)这对我们双方都有好处的。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)我很高兴你找到了我的信号。
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)希望你能帮忙！
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)所以你还有兴趣吗？
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)我知道你不会拒绝的。
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)你回来了？这意味着你会帮忙吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)我们正在准备下个"行动"，你想加入我们吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)听起来很有趣，好的，我愿意加入。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)我这儿有些有意思的宝贝，你有兴趣吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)好，听起来不错。我会在站里的老地方等你。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)东西都在保险柜里，坐标马上给你。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)我准备好了就去拿。
(player declines mission offer)如果你改变主意，回来找我。
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)啊......你会回来的。我敢肯定。
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)什么？不！拜托！
(player accepts mission offer)我就知道我可以指望你。
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)好吧。如果你认为你有能力完成这个任务。
(player accepts illegal opportunity)明智之举。别搞砸了。
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)谢谢！祝你好运！
(partial success)如果这就是你能做的最好的…...好吧，就这样。
(failed mission)我希望你不会妄想得到报酬。
(success in mission chain)我们离完成还有一步之遥。
(failure in mission chain)进展并不顺利，但还有挽救的余地。
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)抱歉。看起来不再需要你的帮助了。

page.title: Teladi NPC 4
page.descr: Lines for Teladi NPC 4
page.t: (Metadata, do not translate)[teladi] male female basic
(Greeting - trader / staff)有什么我能帮忙的吗？
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)我们之间没什么好谈的。
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
该请求来自于警用船只。
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)快带我们离开这！
(announced to crew)我们收到了新的命令。
(chosen reward)请挑选一样作为谢礼吧。
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)你的提议很搞笑。
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)就此投降并不会带来利润。
(\'official\' reward)你会得到恰当的回报的。
(first warning - generic)我们无法容忍你的行为。
(first warning to an attacking ship)立即停止你的的攻击。
(warning of consequences - generic)你将自食其果。
(warning of consequences - opening fire)你脑袋已经在靶心上了。
(warning of consequences - sending ships)飞船正在出动。
(warning of consequences - reporting)我们已经报警了。
(report of attack - ships)正在上报针对本舰的攻击行为。
(report of attack - stations)正在上报针对本站的攻击行为。
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)犯罪记录已更新。
(report of attack generic)正在上报犯罪行为。
(ship does not comply)你选择拒绝服从。
(reporting)这里是星系守备部队，正在上报犯罪活动。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)路上当心，注意星区守备部队。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)守备部队来了！怎么办啊？
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)快把货卸了，弹射出去！
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)真是个好对付的买家！
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们被击中了。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)有东西击中了我们。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们在挨打。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)他们的弱点是我们力量的源泉。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)他们承受不住更多伤害了。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续攻击当前目标。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续集火这个目标。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)不要回应他们的请求。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)他们根本没有机会。
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)救命！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)让我离开这儿！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)我受不了了！
(variant)(taunt line - generic)你的存在是多余的。
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)停一下，求你了！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)请饶我们一命！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)我们损失惨重，请饶了我们！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)饶我一命！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)我的船要沉了，请高抬贵手！
(pilot bailing from ship)用我的船换我的命！
(congratulations after combat from captain)同志们，打得好！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)我们收到了新的攻击指令！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)新攻击命令！
(preparing new attack orders)准备对目标开火！
(preparing new attack orders during combat)集火这个目标！
(reaction to friendly fire)兄弟，能不能停手？
(reaction to friendly fire)你快把我的盾打穿了！
(enemy ship or station exploding)它要爆了！
(ship taking shield damage)护盾遭到攻击。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)这没什么效果。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)你可没那么容易弄死我。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)无用功！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)我可不会轻易放过你！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)这可一点都不明智，飞行员！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)还想再来点吗？
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你是不可能成功的！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)我们很快就能了结此事！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)留给你的时间不多了！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你的嘲讽对我们没用。
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你是认真的？
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你觉得你能吓住我？
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)要想引起我的注意，你还得再努力点。
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)不能死在这里！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)我真是笨！我会试着不再犯相同的错误。
(variant)(taunt - xenon)我要把你回收，当成备用零件！
(variant)(taunt - silent enemy)你马上就要在宇宙里消失了！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)这个破机器是做生意的绊脚石。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)我的防御可以轻松化解这种程度的攻击。
(variant)(losing an enemy)我得赶紧摆脱这个讨厌鬼！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)这点伤害连个蛋都打不破！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)这对我的收支表几乎没有影响！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)我跟你没完，我给你讲。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你会死的。
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)我可以多出点钱，你再考虑一下吧？
(variant)(NPC hired)真的很感激，我会尽全力的。
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。
该指令可能需要更长时间完成。
将新坐标分发到各僚舰上。
所有船只到达后向我报告。
报告：所有船只已到达指定位置。
(grateful)没有你我们是不可能成功的。
(during combat)保持阵型，我们需要支援，现在！
(group of small ships - winning)我们正在碾压他们！
(group of small ships - winning)我们压制住了他们！
(group of small ships - losing)我们完全处于下风。
(group of small ships - losing)我们快承受不住了。
(response to distress call - singular)坚持住，我来了！
(response to distress call - plural)我们已收到你的请求，正在前往。
请按引导停靠至指定位置。
他们已为我们划定停靠位置。
请按照信号将飞船对齐。
你的到来是我们的荣幸。
我们衷心欢迎你的到来。
(Informing player ship will soon undock)飞船即将离港。
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)我在等待你的起飞指令。
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)如果你要起飞，请告诉我。
有艘飞船正在准备离港。
离港飞船，你已被授权离港。一路平安。
使用这些条件进行搜索。
我找到了与搜索条件相匹配的贸易要约。
告诉那个空间站我们正在路上。
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)应用到哪艘飞船上？
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)让我想想。
(variant)(fluff - finished repair)现在都恢复正常工作了。
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)我的工作完成了。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)马上就好。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)还有什么需要我做的吗？
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)可以了，继续你的生意吧。
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)你扫描吧。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)正如我的所料。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)这应该是藏的好好的。
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)我很好奇你这有什么值钱的玩意儿。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)啥都没有！
(variant)(ship scan result)哟，不错嘛。我得捞点好处才行。
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)看来我除了乖乖把货物交出来之外别无选择了。
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)还是把船让给你算了。
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。
(station / ship hacked)看起来我们被骇入了。
(station security saw suspicious activity)发现可疑活动。
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)安保船只正在上报可疑的活动。
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)派出增援安保船只。
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)出动应急分队的战斗机。
确保工作人员知道哪里要去修理。
(call to security forces - minor)留意所有可疑的动向。
(call to security forces - major)立即向我们汇报所有可疑动向。
(call to security forces - search)搜索可疑的动向。
我在这里发现了些东西。
我们在这里发现了些东西。
我们没有可用的收集无人机。
正在扫描我们周边的小行星。
只寻找我们的目标资源。
(NPC moves onto player\'s ship)我登上了你的飞船并做好了出发准备。
(NPC moves off player ship)这趟多谢了。后会有期。
(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(on failure, somber)我们今天的损失无可挽回。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。
(pod attached)开始接敌。准备攻入敌方船体。
(marine lost during breach)出现人员伤亡！需要提防出现在船体上的反抗！
其中一支小队被压制了。
(lots of fighting noise)我们伤亡惨重。
(lots of fighting noise)我们正在推进。途中遭遇很多抵抗。
我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官阵亡了。我们的防线正在崩溃。
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！
(emergency event mission offer)我现在真的需要一些帮助。
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)我冒着巨大风险发出信号，所以如果你破解了这个信号，请保守秘密。我这儿有事相求。
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)有人能听到我吗？喂？！我本不应该这样广播求救的，但我真的需要帮助！拜托！我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)会有人在这里吗？我需要帮助！拜托，如果你能听到这个，我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)在附近发现走私船。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的违禁品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法商品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法数据。
(player looks at offer - generic)有兴趣接个工作吗？
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)对你来说应该没有任何难度。
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)你需要运用你的智慧。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)你破解了我的信号。很好。
(player looks at illegal mission offer)这对我们双方都有好处的。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)我很高兴你找到了我的信号。
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)希望你能帮忙！
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)所以你还有兴趣吗？
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)我知道你不会拒绝的。
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)你回来了？这意味着你会帮忙吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)我们有个小型突袭计划。有兴趣参与么？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)这个看起来有利可图啊。我当然想参与其中了。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)这些货物要是浪费掉就可惜了。你拿去如何？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)成交。咱们老地方见。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)我在附近一个保险柜里放了些好东西，并且我会把坐标发给你。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)我现在有点忙，不过我会尽快去拿货的。
(player declines mission offer)如果你改变主意，回来找我。
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)啊......你会回来的。我敢肯定。
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)什么？不！拜托！
(player accepts mission offer)我就知道我可以指望你。
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)好吧。如果你认为你有能力完成这个任务。
(player accepts illegal opportunity)明智之举。别搞砸了。
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)谢谢！祝你好运！
(partial success)如果这就是你能做的最好的…...好吧，就这样。
(failed mission)我希望你不会妄想得到报酬。
(success in mission chain)我们离完成还有一步之遥。
(failure in mission chain)进展并不顺利，但还有挽救的余地。
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)抱歉。看起来不再需要你的帮助了。
你好，驾驶员。想不想赚点外快？我们一向欢迎新鲜血液参到我们的行动中。
如果你感兴趣就来找我吧。
你看起来是个会把握机会的人。
只要价钱合适，我们就可以把工作列表的访问权限给你。
以我们的声望，我相信你可以猜到某些工作的内容。相信会有你感兴趣的。
只是除了我们之外，一路上恐怕交不到多少朋友。
(response to \'any jobs for me?\')从来不会缺活儿干。当然，重要的工作可不会轻易交给任何人。
(reject)因为同情而雇佣别人不符合生意之道，改天再聊吧。
好样的。你现在可以在我们经营的区域寻找任务机会了。
我们对你抱有很大期望。
看样子你没有足够的资金。请不要浪费我们的时间。

page.title: Teladi NPC 5
page.descr: Lines for Teladi NPC 5
page.t: (Metadata, do not translate)[teladi] male female basic
(Greeting - trader / staff)有什么我能帮忙的吗？
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)我们之间没什么好谈的。
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
该请求来自于警用船只。
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)快带我们离开这！
(variant)(refusal to do something)不，很抱歉，恕难从命。
(announced to crew)我们收到了新的命令。
(chosen reward)请挑选一样作为谢礼吧。
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)你是认真的吗？开什么玩笑！
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)我看不出投降有什么好处。
(\'official\' reward)你会得到恰当的回报的。
(first warning - generic)我们无法容忍你的行为。
(first warning to an attacking ship)立即停止你的的攻击。
(warning of consequences - generic)你将自食其果。
(warning of consequences - opening fire)你脑袋已经在靶心上了。
(warning of consequences - sending ships)飞船正在出动。
(warning of consequences - reporting)我们已经报警了。
(report of attack - ships)正在上报针对本舰的攻击行为。
(report of attack - stations)正在上报针对本站的攻击行为。
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)犯罪记录已更新。
(report of attack generic)正在上报犯罪行为。
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)明智的选择。
(ship does not comply)你选择拒绝服从。
(reporting)这里是星系守备部队，正在上报犯罪活动。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)留意巡逻队。
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)被发现了。这下咋办？
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)快把货物弹射出去。
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)这么简单！这买卖值！
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们被击中了。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)有东西击中了我们。
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)我们在挨打。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)他们在负隅顽抗！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)我们马上就能让他们彻底出局了！
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续攻击当前目标。
(multi-crew ship / station? attacking - captain response)继续集火这个目标。
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)他们马上就撑不住了！
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)咬紧敌人！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)情况不妙！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)赶紧做个了断！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)看样子不妙！
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)住手！
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)我要让你早日退休！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)求你了，高抬贵手！
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)求你放我一马。
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)别对我们下死手，求你了！
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)我们的船就快撑不住了！求你赶紧停火！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)饶了我吧！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)求你放我条生路！
(pilot bailing from ship)用我的船换我的命！
(congratulations after combat from captain)同志们，打得好！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)我们收到了新的攻击指令！
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)新攻击命令！
(preparing new attack orders)准备对目标开火！
(preparing new attack orders during combat)集火这个目标！
(reaction to friendly fire)兄弟，能不能停手？
(reaction to friendly fire)你快把我的盾打穿了！
(enemy ship or station exploding)它要爆了！
(ship taking shield damage)护盾遭到攻击。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)你不会真以为这样就打败我了吧。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)你就这点能耐？
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)这招可不管用！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)你会后悔的。
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)你那是什么馊主意！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)既然如此，我就让你尝点苦头吧。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)解决你可不是什么难事儿！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)我们会尽快解决这个问题的！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)许下你的遗愿吧！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)管好你这张嘴！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)你可没资格威胁我！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)想吓唬我可没那么容易！
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)不过如此！
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)别做梦了！
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)我不是有意朝你开火的。抱歉！
(variant)(taunt - xenon)你还是变成废铁更值钱！
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)这破机器真烦人。
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)我从不轻易认输。
(variant)(missile use)也许导弹能派上用场了。
(variant)(torpedo use)我想这时候来发鱼雷是很划得来的。
(variant)(losing an enemy)太离谱了！我得赶紧逃命。
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)这样开火根本捞不到好处！
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)简直是在挠痒痒！
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)这才刚开始呢。
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)你毫无胜算。
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)我能否为你提供点什么来促成这笔交易呢？
(variant)(NPC bribe succeeds)好样的！这对咱们都有好处。
(variant)(NPC hired)期待着能助你一臂之力。
(variant)(NPC fired)真可惜。为你工作的这段时间我收益颇丰。
(order added to queue - informal)已加入任务列表。
该指令可能需要更长时间完成。
将新坐标分发到各僚舰上。
所有船只到达后向我报告。
报告：所有船只已到达指定位置。
(grateful)没有你我们是不可能成功的。
(during combat)保持阵型，我们需要支援，现在！
(group of small ships - winning)我们正在碾压他们！
(group of small ships - winning)我们压制住了他们！
(group of small ships - losing)我们完全处于下风。
(group of small ships - losing)我们快承受不住了。
(response to distress call - singular)坚持住，我来了！
(response to distress call - plural)我们已收到你的请求，正在前往。
请按引导停靠至指定位置。
他们已为我们划定停靠位置。
请按照信号将飞船对齐。
你的到来是我们的荣幸。
我们衷心欢迎你的到来。
(Informing player ship will soon undock)飞船即将离港。
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)我在等待你的起飞指令。
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)如果你要起飞，请告诉我。
有艘飞船正在准备离港。
离港飞船，你已被授权离港。一路平安。
使用这些条件进行搜索。
我找到了与搜索条件相匹配的贸易要约。
告诉那个空间站我们正在路上。
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)应用到哪艘飞船上？
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)我过去瞧瞧。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)就快好了。
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)还有别的活儿给我干么？
(order for new units)让我们再订购些新单位。
(order for new ammo)让我们再订购些弹药。
(cap ship repair)让空间站开始维修。
(cap ship / station repair)启动维修无人机。
(cap ship / station repair)立刻启动维修无人机。
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)这里是星区安保部队。
(ship scan warning - cargo)请停下，我们将扫描你的货舱。
(ship scan warning - inventory)请停下，我们将扫描你的舱内存货。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)扫描结果一切正常。你可以离开了。
(ship scan result - something found)发现违禁品。
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)立刻交出你的违禁品。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)好的，请便。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)好的，马上。
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)我不明白。我一直都很小心的。
(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)这些货物是未经授权的！
(report to superior)我的飞船正在被扫描。
(variant)(ship scan warning)真希望你带了什么好东西。
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)啥都没有！失望透顶！
(variant)(ship scan result)噢，这个看起来很有赚头！
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)这些货归你了。
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)船归你了！
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)我注意到一个小缺口，有人可能对船体使用了炸药。
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)电力供应被切断了，有人使用了电磁脉冲装置。
(station / ship hacked)看起来我们被骇入了。
(station security saw suspicious activity)发现可疑活动。
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)安保船只正在上报可疑的活动。
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)派出增援安保船只。
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)出动应急分队的战斗机。
确保工作人员知道哪里要去修理。
(call to security forces - minor)留意所有可疑的动向。
(call to security forces - major)立即向我们汇报所有可疑动向。
(call to security forces - search)搜索可疑的动向。
我在这里发现了些东西。
我们在这里发现了些东西。
我们没有可用的收集无人机。
正在扫描我们周边的小行星。
只寻找我们的目标资源。
(NPC moves onto player\'s ship)我登上了你的飞船并做好了出发准备。
(NPC moves off player ship)这趟多谢了。后会有期。
(No room on player\'s ship)当前飞船没有足够空间搭载乘客。
(NPC wants to leave ship)请在最近的空间站将我放下。
(Player receives licence)恭喜你获得新的执照。
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)如果你想寻找黑市商品，找我就对了。
(Allied greeting)非常荣幸在这里见到你。
(Start of greeting)代表我们组织：(keep space)
我们需要把目标打得再烂一点。
(to marine)指挥官，你那边什么情况。
(on failure, somber)我们今天的损失无可挽回。
(boarding pod launched)登陆舱发射。向目标移动。
(pod attached)开始接敌。准备攻入敌方船体。
(marine lost during breach)出现人员伤亡！需要提防出现在船体上的反抗！
其中一支小队被压制了。
(lots of fighting noise)我们伤亡惨重。
(lots of fighting noise)我们正在推进。途中遭遇很多抵抗。
我们已经控制了几个区域。继续向前推进。
指挥官阵亡了。我们的防线正在崩溃。
我有一个小队正在绕过封锁。
自毁程序已经被激活。我们正尝试关闭它。
我认为我们到不了舰桥。请求中止行动。
我决定了。中止行动！撤回到你们的登陆舱！
(self-destruct imminent, somber)对不起，长官，看上去不太妙。
(success)我们拥有控制权了。现在正确保各个系统能安全运行。
(target damaged)先别毁了它，我们还在里面！
(emergency event mission offer)我现在真的需要一些帮助。
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)我冒着巨大风险发出信号，所以如果你破解了这个信号，请保守秘密。我这儿有事相求。
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)有人能听到我吗？喂？！我本不应该这样广播求救的，但我真的需要帮助！拜托！我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)会有人在这里吗？我需要帮助！拜托，如果你能听到这个，我需要帮助！
(data leak signal - plea for help)嘿！我知道这不太符合常规，但是如果你能听到这个，我需要一些帮助。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)在附近发现走私船。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的违禁品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法商品。
(station masstraffic mini-mission)检测到无人机上的非法数据。
(player looks at offer - generic)有兴趣接个工作吗？
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)对你来说应该没有任何难度。
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)你需要运用你的智慧。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)你破解了我的信号。很好。
(player looks at illegal mission offer)这对我们双方都有好处的。
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)我很高兴你找到了我的信号。
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)希望你能帮忙！
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)所以你还有兴趣吗？
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)我知道你不会拒绝的。
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)你回来了？这意味着你会帮忙吗？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)有个发财的机会来了。有兴趣么？
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)听起来很不错。算我一份！
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)这些东西你感兴趣么？它们在我手里存不了多久了。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)东西我要了，只要价钱合理就行。你可以在空间站上的老地方找到我。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)我在附近有个保险柜，里面放了些东西。这是它的坐标。
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)我现在有点忙，不过我之后会尽快把东西取回的。
(player declines mission offer)如果你改变主意，回来找我。
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)啊......你会回来的。我敢肯定。
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)什么？不！拜托！
(player accepts mission offer)我就知道我可以指望你。
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)好吧。如果你认为你有能力完成这个任务。
(player accepts illegal opportunity)明智之举。别搞砸了。
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)谢谢！祝你好运！
(partial success)如果这就是你能做的最好的…...好吧，就这样。
(failed mission)我希望你不会妄想得到报酬。
(success in mission chain)我们离完成还有一步之遥。
(failure in mission chain)进展并不顺利，但还有挽救的余地。
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)抱歉。看起来不再需要你的帮助了。

page.title: Teladi NPC 6
page.descr: Lines for Teladi NPC 6
